column5: English
column11: English

column5: Hmm.
column11: Hmm.

column4:
テストの結果も悪くない。
これで完成といって
よいだろう。
column5: These test results aren't bad either. With this, one might call it complete.
column11: Those test results aren't bad either. With this, one might call it complete.

column4: オーギュスト＿うれしい

column5: It's a splendid outcome.
column11: It's a splendid outcome.

column4:
我ら２人が共同制作した
だけのことはある。
column5: A piece that only the two of us could have come up with.
column11: A piece that only the two of us could have come up with.

column4:
ちょうどいいころに
来たみたいだぜ。
column5: Looks like we picked the right time to drop in.
column11: Looks like we picked the right time to drop in.

column4: オーギュスト＿うれしい

column5: Oh, it's you?
column11: It's you?

column4:
八工房が最強のマリオネーショ
ンギアを作ろうとしてる
って聞いて、とんできたぜ。
column5: When we heard the Eight Workshops were trying to make their strongest Marionation Gear, we came running.
column11: When we heard that the Eight Workshops are each trying to create the strongest Marionation Gear, we came running.

column5: So, did you get it worked out?
column11: So, have you been successful?

column4: 十文字＿ちょっとした驚き

column5: Hmm.
column11: Hmm.

column4:
最強のマリオネーションギアか。
ワクワクするな。
column5: Is that the strongest Marionation Gear? My heart's pounding out of my chest here!
column11: Is that the strongest Marionation Gear? My heart is pounding.

column4:
最強の人形。
多くの人形師が追い求める、
究極の仕事だ。
column5:
The strongest Puppet...
The very thing that so many Puppeteers pursue: a masterpiece.
column11:
The strongest mech.
The very thing that so many Pupeeteer's pursue, a masterpiece.

column4:
だが、それをやりとげた者は
いない。
column5: But no one has ever been able to accomplish it.
column11: But, no one has ever been able to accomplish that.

column4:
なぜなら、
最強などというものは
存在しないからだ。
column5: The reason: there is no such thing as {the strongest}.
column11: The reason being, that there is no such things as the {strongest}.

column4:
永久に辿り着くことのない境地。
それが最強というものさ。
column5: When it comes to being {the strongest}, the possibilities are infinite and unrealizable.
column11: The things about the strongest, is that there are infinite possibilities which could never be obtained.

column4: オーギュスト＿基本姿勢

だが最強を目指し、
努力することには
意味がある。
column5: But when you're aiming for {the strongest}, there's still meaning in your efforts.
column11: But when you're aiming at the strongest, there's still meaning in your efforts.

column4:
我々はリアリストでね。
話し合った末に、
１つの答えに到達した。
column5: We are realists. After discussion, we came to a single conclusion.
column11: We are realists. After a discussion, we came to a single conclusion.

column4:
我々が得意とするのは、武具を
操る人形を作ること。
column5: Our forte is in making Puppets with manipulable armaments.
column11: Our forte is in making mechs where the armour can be manipulated.

column4:
だからこそ、最強の武具を
追求してみたのさ。
column5: Hence, we chose to pursue the strongest armament.
column11: Hence, we decided to pursue the strongest armour.

column4:
最強の武具。
すなわち、より長い武器だ。
column5: The strongest armament -- that is, a long-reach weapon.
column11:
The strongest armour.
That is, having a long distance weapon.

column4: オーギュスト＿冷静な顔

column5: Observe. That weapon...
column11: Observe. That weapon...

column4:
短い武器と長い武器が争えば、
どうなるか？
column5: What happens when you pit a long weapon against a shorter one?
column11: What happens when you pit a long weapon against a shorter one?

column4:
結果は明白。
長い武器が先に相手を貫く。
column5:
The outcome is obvious.
The longer weapon will pierce the opponent first.
column11:
The outcome is obvious.
The longer weapon will pierce the opponent first.

column4:
だから、我らが作り出したのは、
最も長い武器を持つ人形。
長槍人形だ。
column5: That's why we've created this Puppet, equipped with an extremely long weapon. A Lancer Puppet.
column11: That's why we've created this mech, equipped with an extremely long weapon. A Lancer Mech.

column4:
接近戦で
これにかなう人形はない。
column5: There is no Puppet able to rival it in close combat.
column11: There are no mechs who'll be able to rival it in close combat.

column4:
これが最強の答えってのは、
ちょっと単純すぎる気も
するけどな……。
column5: So this is the answer you've come up with for the {strongest}, but I can't help but think it's a bit too simple...
column11: So this is the answer you've come up with for the {strongest}, but I can't help but think it's a bit too simple...

column4:
ま、強そうなのは確かだ。
売ってくれよ。
column5: Well, it certainly looks strong, at least. Put it up for sale.
column11: Well, it certainly looks strong at least. Put it up for sale.

column5: Hmm.
column11: Hm.

column4:
ならば、この人形と戦って
みるがいい。
column5: In that case, you should try fighting this Puppet.
column11: In that case, you should try fighting this mech.

column4: 勝てば売ってくれるんだな。
column5: If we win, let us buy it!
column11: If we win, let us buy it.

column4:
約束しよう。
だが長槍人形は強いぞ。
column5:
It's a promise. 
But I warn you: this Lancer Puppet is strong.
column11:
It's a promise. 
But, I warn you that this Lancer Mech is strong.

column4:
いくら/p君でも
勝つのは難しい。
挑戦だと思って挑んでみたまえ。
column5: Victory will not be easy, even for /p. Think of it as a challenge and have a go.
column11:
Victory will not be easy, even for /p.
Think of it as a challenge, and have a go.
